|vendor_id = 14e4 |device_id = 4331 |subvendor_id = 106b |subdevice_id = 00ef |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = QDS-BRCM1062 |icid = 4324A-BRCM1062 |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 20:C9:D0
|chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4331; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = MHF4 |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 3 |rxchains = 3 |sstreams = 3 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 450/450 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = Bluetooth SoC;Broadcom;BCM20702A3;BCM20702, A3KWFBG, HC1212 P13, 190644 N1W;1; ,,, 2.4/5GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SE5515;SE5515, 2113J, 1211 CN;2; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE5019T;SiGe, 5019T, 110FS;1; ,,, 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2598L;SiGe, 2598L, 1240W;1; |flags = Bluetooth 4.0 |802dot11_protocols = abgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 02/07/2012 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00LAW6146 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The PCIe connector for this device is proprietary :(see external links below for more info). The antenna connector used for this card is presumed to be '''MHF4'''.
[[Broadcom BCM94331CSAX]] :This module is using the following components... *[[Broadcom]] BCM4331 (BCM4331KML1G [P21], :different chip pkg. from the standard BCM4331KMLG) :*w/ 2 '''Skyworks''' SE5515 Dual Band Front End Modules (FEMs) :*w/ 1 '''Skyworks''' ('''SiGe''') SE5019T 5GHz Power Amplifier (PA) :*w/ 1 '''Skyworks''' ('''SiGe''') SE2598L 2.4GHz Power Amplifier (PA) *[[Broadcom]] BCM20702 rev.A3 Bluetooth SoC (USB)
This is the wireless module for <small>at least</small> the... :'''Apple''' MacBook Pro w/ Retina display (2012) *[[Apple Macbook Pro 15" (Retina, A1398)]] (MC975, MC976)
:<small>The 20:C9:D0 OUI used in this entry is per the module depicted in the above photo..</small>
==Links of Interest== ===Teardowns w/ module visible=== *[http://www.techrepublic.com/photos/cracking-open-the-apple-macbook-pro-with-retina-display/6372862?seq=26&tag=content;siu-container#photopaging ''Cracking Open the Apple MacBook Pro with Retina Display'' on '''TechRepublic'''] :('''Apple''' MacBook Pro 2012 w/ Retina display) *[http://www.ifixit.com/Guide/MacBook+Pro+with+Retina+Display+Bill+of+Materials/9532/1 ''MacBook Pro with Retina Display Bill of Materials'' on '''iFixit''']
===Other=== *[[User:Skvo|''Skvo'']] [http://www.tonymacx86.com/general-hardware-discussion/99327-could-next-wlan-bluetooth-combo-card-2013-macbooks.html notes the pinout of the proprietary connector used on '''tonymacx86 Forums'''] *[http://forums.opensuse.org/english/get-technical-help-here/laptop/476258-howto-2012-retina-display-macbook-pro-opensuse-linux.html ''(HOWTO) 2012 Retina Macbook Pro and openSUSE Linux'' on '''SUSE Linux Forum'''] :(lspci dump [sans subsystem]) *[http://www.quora.com/MacBook-Pro-with-Retina-Display/How-much-would-the-new-Retina-display-MacBook-Pro-cost-if-Apple-didnt-mark-up-the-components-so-much/answer/Christopher-Huang-1/comment/1035533 ''C. Huang'' on '''Quora''' notes BCM4331 as used for the '''Apple''' MacBook Pro 2012] *[http://www.applelife.ru/threads/zapuskaem-kombo-moduli-wi-fi-bluetooth-ot-apple-na-obychnom-kompjutere.39681/?_debug=1 Thread on '''applelife.ru''' w/ lspci dump (and subsystem)] :Subsystem appears to be 106b:00ef
[[Category:English Documentation]]
